title: Emilio Segrè
summary: Emilio Gino Segrè (1 February 1905 – 22 April 1989[1]) was an Italian-American physicist and Nobel laureate, who discovered the elements technetium and astatine, and the antiproton, a subatomic antiparticle, for which he was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1959 along with Owen Chamberlain.
